email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this email finds you well. We are pleased to offer a freight rate for the shipment of 5000MT of Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam on CIF terms. Our initial freight quote is USD 48 per metric ton.

The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN HORIZON, with a DWT of 85000 and LOA of 220m. The laycan is set for October 10-15, 2023. Please let us know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 45 per metric ton?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
John Doe
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, we can offer a revised freight rate of USD 46 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is set at USD 10,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains October 10-15, 2023. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 46 per metric ton, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best regards,
John Doe
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Houston on October 10, 2023, with a 24-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Houston to Rotterdam - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best regards,
John Doe
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Houston to Rotterdam - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers
